name: Collaborative Spirit in NFTs: Building Communities
description: Panel with artists SenorPantsNFT, Sabet, Wondermundo and and Nima Beheshtian, Founder and CEO of Layerr

speakers.name: Eric Spivak
speakers.bio:
Eric “Motivate” Spivak is an Educator,
Trusted Advisor & Key Opinion Leader
in the Blockchain Space
Emerging Tech & Web3 World.

speakers.name: SenorPantsNFT
speakers.bio: Artist masquerading as a Revenue Operations executive. Out of my comfort zone on purpose. Adding value to the space with art, humor, and meaningful conversation

speakers.name: Sabet
speakers.bio: Sabet is an Iranian-American artist and the creator of TokyoPunks NFT. More info can be found here: https://www.sabet.art/about

speakers.name: Wondermundo
speakers.bio:
Hi. My name is Jessica (aka Wonder) and I’m a first generation Mexican-American multimedia artist with over 20 years experience in content, learning, and collaboration design. I entered the NFT space last April after rediscovering my own art.

Now, I’m all in web3 selling my art as NFTs and helping projects scale.

I joined the NFT space in April of 2021 as an artist and have a collection of 300 NFTs.

My artistic work is minted on my own $wonder contract by Manifold and platforms such as Makersplace, Foundation, OpenSea, Objkt.com, Versum, FxHash, Paras, and Exchange.art.

I am also a community builder and helped build a couple early NFT communities like #famjam and #smolgang in 2021. Currently, I am working to build 0xTHULU.

I aim to educate, empower, and uplift others through my platform and experience.
